website_summaries.verdict: Best bet for those intimidated by bags and buckets included in other kits.
pros: As easy as it gets – just fill with water and squeeze
Owners rave about how easy it is to clean and store
cons: Unlike other kits, this only works with water solution, not coffee

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing, no longer have to stop riding my dildo if i have some leftover dookie inside, clean it out first then im free to ride my huge silicone cock
customer_reviews.author: cglynn

customer_reviews.title: where has this thing been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Tiny tube is barely noticeable. Squirting water up my butt is my new favorite hobby, and I can't wait to have some anal without being paranoid and self conscious and worrying about accidentally ruining it. Its kind of tricky to fill because the hole is so small, but if you squeeze it then put the nozzle in the water it sucks it right up. I haven't been this excited abut something so simple in a long time. Where has this thing been all my life?!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Leavitt

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product but needs a check valve
customer_reviews.text: Very nice material and build quality. Loading the bulb with liquid was no problem for me. I just wish it had a check valve to prevent back flow in the event that you relax/change your grip on the bulb while dispensing the liquid.
customer_reviews.author: lh

customer_reviews.title: Great for clearing a path
customer_reviews.text: I received this very quickly, and it worked just as I hoped it would! My boyfriend and I decided to try some backyard fun, so I bought this so that there would be no mishaps. It goes in cleanly so other things will come out cleanly if you get what I mean lol. 10/10 would recommend if you’re looking to use this:)
customer_reviews.author: MCKrisMC

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done over all good product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product gets the job done I mean not much to it LOL. Only complaint is unlike the disposables that has the feature where there's no regurgitation this after pressing sucks back which is kind of gross.I've had real problems with it I'm not taking off anything for it and I would recommend this because you don't need a super expensive one to get this done so I would tell anyone who needs to just clean themselves to buy this...also comes with two tips a longer softer clear curved tubish piece and then the black one
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Product is iffy...Do your research first! Look for alternatives.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this product is questionable. That being said, I would not recommend this to anyone. The more is short which makes it difficult to be efficient. The connection between the nozzle and bulb is weak which leaks after a couple uses. I ended up putting it on the shelf and looking for another Product. Also- The seller is offering a "free package" including a "free nozzle" exchange for a review which to my knowledge is against Amazon's policies.
customer_reviews.author: Alan J.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic. Every get that feeling where your going to blow out your anus taking a shi?
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic, pair this with a squatty potty and you'll have the cleanest anu$ on your block. This really cut down the time I spend in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning your bottom
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because me and my husband have anal sex. Most of the time it's clean but this is extra insurance. It works well if you use it right. Just the tip needs to be interested for cleaning. Don't go too deep. Don't squirt too hard or too fast. You just want to clean your rectum. Best probably used when standing over the toilet but if you go slowly, laying down helps too.
customer_reviews.author: Jusitn

customer_reviews.title: best douche, no air
customer_reviews.text: Best douche I've ever owned. Easy to clean, easy to use. I've had douches in the past that, no matter how careful I was, ended up pumping air into me along with the water. It is REALLY dangerous to squeeze air inside up inside of yourself, but luckily I don't have that problem with this douche.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: I have to join the resounding chorus here of "Where has this been all my life??!!" Seriously!! I've used store bought enemas in the past with resulting death cramps that put me out of commission for the entire rest of the day. So I was scared to try one again, but I had a special trip to go see a special person coming up so I wanted to give it another shot. This one looked different and boy is it ever! Talk about a night and day difference! Easy peasy and feels great! This little thing has saved my butt! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: After a couple months it has begun to break but good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Really simple to use and worked well for a while, but now a few months later the part where the plastic and rubber meet is starting to crumble? As well as the end of the straw has gotten jagged and I have no idea how this has happened or where that plastic has gone. Which is disconcerting. UPDATE: The company offered me a refund or replacement, which is much appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Alaina

customer_reviews.title: No box!!! No discretion!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Real disappointed!!! first of doesn't come in a box which I find to be real unsanitary🤢😷. I thought I was buying a brand new product. Second no discretion! Came in just clear bag with it clearly labeled🙄...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'd like to assume it does its job well
customer_reviews.text: First time user here. I'd like to assume it does its job well. Just make sure you lube up the tiny tube!
customer_reviews.author: Irene May

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Made
customer_reviews.text: I have used this type of product before and found quite a few that leak where the nozzle attaches. I would get into the tub for easy rinsing if it did even though it was the clean water going in. So when I got this and used it for the first time I got in the tub and was surprised it didn't leak a drop. The soft flexible tube is my favorite, great idea.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff B

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! Having never used an enema before I was a little nervous, but it’s incredibly easy to use and works great! No discomfort, and easy to take apart and clean as well. The company also contacted me directly to thank me for my purchase and offered to send me two additional nozzle tips for free!
customer_reviews.author: Micah T

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Very comfortable! Some products past can scratch you or leave you feeling sore. This product is gentle and a steal for how cheap it is! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Crandell

customer_reviews.title: chemical smell, illegal use of FDA logo on box.
customer_reviews.text: awful awful chemical smell. medical grade silicone should have no smell at all. It “bubbles” when water is run over it, so it is obviously porous material, which is dangerous for an enema kit because it could harbor bacteria. This is trash. I ordered this because of the claim that it is FDA approved, and the product even has the FDA logo stamped on the box. This is clearly false. When i became suspicious because of the smell, I looked up FDA’s policy on the usage of their logo, and it is against federal law to even use the logo on any product because it implies endorsement of a product by a government agency.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Broke almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: Broke almost immediately unfortunately. There's a little black piece of plastic that goes into the rubber part that holds the water. Unfortunately the plastic broke completely on mine and it's not even usable.
customer_reviews.author: DBS

customer_reviews.title: Works somewhat
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. Go to the store and get a Turkey baster
customer_reviews.author: Tone

customer_reviews.title: More difficult to use than disposable enemas.
customer_reviews.text: As someone who has historically just purchased disposable enemas to use for my douching/cleaning out needs, I was really excited to finally upgrade and get a reliable and high quality product like this instead. But, as I’m sure some other reviewers have mentioned- the product really, truly is not easy to clean or fill in my opinion. When it comes to douching usually one flush isn’t good enough, and this product does NOT make it an easy task to go back and refill while still in douching positioning to give things another rinse.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Grey

customer_reviews.title: Works great in the shop for Glue applications.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't buy it for it's intended use, but to dispense carpenters glue. I had a large project that I needed to glue prior to attach with screws. Thought this item would work. Worked like a charm. With the thin nozzle was able to place glue in exact spots needed. Cap kept glue from drying. It cleaned out great, with no residual glue left behind. Not sure how it would work for it's intended use, but highly recommend it for glue work. Might raise a few eyebrows in your shop, but still works great.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy it
customer_reviews.text: It works well and does what it's designed for. You can certainly gen enough water in and out of there. The only issue I have with it is that it's hard to clean. The silicone bulb had a small opening and the inserted tip is a very thin tube. This makes it hard to really clean the inside and get it to dry after. I wish it came with a scrubbing brush. Other than that it really helps clean things out.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Gets the Job Done
customer_reviews.text: This product gets the job done and does what you expect, but I have to give it four stars because the plastic head can be very painful sometimes to use without a good water-based lube on it. I am going to try other products when it comes time to buy one, since I know there are others that are more user-friendly, but I wouldn't hate it if I ended up having to buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Anomalyzer

customer_reviews.title: Clean, clear and under control.
customer_reviews.text: It is always you best bet to be safe. The enema bulb really is amazing. Without delving to deep, please allow me to state that it works best with warm water. When you use the enema bulb in combination with warm water your mind can rest easy knowing the area is clear. Highly advise buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Calicat

customer_reviews.title: If you of average weight, it should work for you.
customer_reviews.text: I disliked the nozzle. It seems that any of them are too sharp. The nozzle should be more thick and rounded on the end. I have had bleeding coming from my anus after using it. Now, I weigh 220 pounds so it is hard to get the right angle. There must be a better product to solve this problem. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: You will do better using a disposable enema as the tip for this ...
customer_reviews.text: You will do better using a disposable enema as the tip for this product is extremely hard unlike the tip of the disposable enema which is soft and flexible.
customer_reviews.author: M Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Are you serious?
customer_reviews.text: This thing is about double the size of a booger sucker for babies. So small you can even properly empty the bulb. Very difficult to empty the bulb. And the tips are way too short too. Very frustrated. I just three it away!
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Breaks Easily; Good Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: The part where the straw part hooks up to the bulb broke after like two uses, and made it very difficult to use after that.. I ended up buying basically the same thing, but from a different seller/post and it works fine, and even came with different kinds of straws! Don't get this one, find another.. EDIT: Although I did not have a great experience with the enema, the customer service was great... After seeing my dissatisfaction, they e-mailed me and offered me a refund or a replacement... Now, I am definitely pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Great enema, esp for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by how much I like this product. There were mixed reviews, but they seemed to be from people who hadn't ever used an enema before. I really appreciated the two nozzle options, one shorter and hard plastic, which is what I'm used to using, and the second one was longer and softer plastic, which I love. So much more comfortable. It's easy to clean, easy to use, so much so that I tossed out my old one.
customer_reviews.author: EthanJ

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy unless you like to get poked on the inside!
customer_reviews.text: Soft rubber which is great but the tube is hard plastic. Not comfortable to use attached all!
customer_reviews.author: BestofBob

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and soft
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing I have found, not to be too tmi but I personally don’t take medicine if I don’t have to. This relieved my stomach. It truly controls the flow and it soft to the touch and you truly don’t even notice it in. 😇 which is the only enema I have used that you don’t know in. Only thing I would say is I wish it came in red my favorite color but this product is the best to me.
customer_reviews.author: Tevin Holbert

customer_reviews.title: Mouth of bulb too small
customer_reviews.text: Hole in bulb for water to go in is so small one could never get this clean again. Also bulb itself is small and their video about squeezing the air out and then filling it with water in the sink only sucks up an ounce or two. Finally, an extra attachment was included, and there was no instructions for how one might use this - it was too big(!) - in fact there was no instructions or text on the box or in the box.
customer_reviews.author: justacoder

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Used this a few times. I received two nozzles. The black one is stiff and the clear one is flexible. The clear nozzle is definitely more comfortable. Tip: If it’s your first time one one, don’t accidentally suck water that you already push out back into the bulb. I was super worried afterwards because I didn’t want bacteria partying in the bulb. If it happens, you can still can still use it. Just be sure to clean both the nozzle and bulb thoroughly (you should do that anyways).
customer_reviews.author: T. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: The product was just as expected. I owned one previously but lost the nozzle to it, so I ordered another. Good thing now is that they come with 3 nozzles now!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: The tube pops out.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why this thing has so many good reviews. Maybe I used it incorrectly but the little tube is not secure at all. It kept popping out. Which is NOT what you need to happen in that situation. While there are lots of jokes in the reviews, I have a son with neurogenic bowel and needs an enema every other day to stay regular. This thing was not fun to work with. I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple, easy and effective for the price
customer_reviews.text: There's not much that has to be involved in quality with a piece of silicone and plastic, so it fits the bill. I use this for an enema I hold in for about 20-30 minutes to get the full absorption and benefits. Works well, you just have to take the top out, immerse it in the liquid then squeeze to let it fill up. Ya can't pour into the tiny hole in the top, people.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: High quality and perfectly sized.
customer_reviews.text: This bulb is great for a quick clean up. The tip is removable allowing it to be washed and cleaned with a disposable pipe cleaner and a mild detergent. The bulb itself if of sufficient size that only a few fill-ups are needed. This comes with a permanent tip as well as a disposable tip. I haven’t looked for getting replacement tips yet, but I’m glad that disposable tips are an option. The tip isn’t so big or wide that it’s unnecessarily uncomfortable. A little water based lubricant on the tip also helps make the process easier.
customer_reviews.author: CLC

customer_reviews.title: does as adveritized
customer_reviews.text: For a daily one shot clean its perfect. if your looking for the once in a while "clean everything that's in your body" event you might want to go with something else. This has a lot of spring back and it gets a little messy if you try to do more then one flush per serving.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Clean!
customer_reviews.text: I am gay male in college and I needed something to help me feel more comfortable, clean, and safe during sex. I was not wanting to spend an excess of money in order to get these attributes in a product. While searching Amazon I came across this product and it has been perfect for me! It was so conveniently small and discreet! Other products never worked for me because of how large the tip of the syringe was. After using this product I felt safe, clean, and worry-free.
customer_reviews.author: Darion Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great product only thing better is their customer service
customer_reviews.text: fantastic product very high quality and excellent customer service I was emailed immediately after i received the product and was asked if I was happy with the product and quality and if i had any questions i will definitely continue to shop with this seller
customer_reviews.author: Justin Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Have patience.
customer_reviews.text: Wish the bulb was bigger. I think you need more water for a good cleanse. Maybe I didn’t actually get it all the way filled? My boyfriend also tried it and he filled it up twice before he had that “urge.” So, I Don”t know... otherwise, I do think lying on your side for insert is the way to go, just FYI.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa M

customer_reviews.title: This review is useless
customer_reviews.text: I get it as a gag gift for my friends. They now use it as a toy for their (too many) ferrets... you can use that information however you like.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor England

customer_reviews.title: The nozzle breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: Bulb seems high quality. But I had trouble putting the nozzle in the bulb. And when I tried to take the nozzle out of the bulb after I used it the nozzle broke off inside the bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works good, but I’m worried about “backwashing” into my bulb & I could use a bigger tube but that’s not a huge concern because I can feel it doing so much work even just with a small tube. I just don’t always get enough water in unless I’m sideways or have the bulb nearly overfilled. A lot of air gets in there either way & I’m not sure if that’s a crucial part of the process, so that’s annoying & noisy...
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth the Price!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a various amount of reasons but it worked well for all of them. You will read from other reviews that it has a chemical smell, this is kinda typical with these kind of products. I was very skeptical at first about it but I would gladly buy another in the future if I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Zur-Linden

customer_reviews.title: Opening hole too small
customer_reviews.text: The opening hole is just too small. It's one thing to immerse in a sink at home to fill the bulb but I would NEVER do this while traveling at a hotel or public places where I don't know how clean the sink is. But you can't directly fill from a tap because the hole is too small. I don't know how to even clean this regularly. Also, I don't even know how to insert the 2nd nozzle. This will go straight to garbage. Stay away from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dav Hid

customer_reviews.title: It makes me smell like what down there!?!?
customer_reviews.text: Was that smell me? No it was the bulb. The thing smells awful it took me a while to figure out it smells like the ink from Sharpies. It gets into the water and I can't wash it out. Maybe a similar pigment is used? The nozzle does not screw in as described. And I would not consider this medical or high quality silicone be any means add in a hard nozzle, extremely difficult to clean, and you've got a recipe for a bad time
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean but it's definitely impossible to ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean but it's definitely impossible to squeeze all the contents out when in use. Squeezing as much as you can to get everything out but you'll still end up with about a quarter of contents left, especially if you're trying to squeeze upwards.
customer_reviews.author: Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: I have had a handful of different ones of these throughout my life. This one is super standard. The tip is comfortable, it is easy to use, travels well, and I appreciate the dark color. All in all this is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: stanley forbes

customer_reviews.title: No more Walmart enemas
customer_reviews.text: This works just as I expected. It’s better than having to go buy enemas at Walmart. Get it while you can!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Discreet, easy to use, and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Great discreet size makes this ideal for travelling or for those with nosy relatives. It comes in a sturdy cardboard box with two attachments. It is very easy to use for someone who has never used such a product before, though it doesn’t come with instructions which would have been nice. Google is your friend. It’s easy to fill and use and clean. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Great product does what it needs to do
customer_reviews.text: --Shipping-- This product arrived on time, and in secure packaging that did not reveal its contents. The box holding the product was sturdy and it also came with 2 types of nozzles. One is the black one which is hard, and the other is a clear plastic nozzle which is softer and may be suitable for those who want it. --Product Functionality-- The product worked. Complete noob in this area, and partner was able to use it. The nozzle is harder, so use tons of water based lube as to not hurt yourself. There was an additional nozzle that was clear and "softer." Overall great product for its use.
customer_reviews.author: Trey

customer_reviews.title: Updated
customer_reviews.text: Customer service is a step above the rest. Personally reached out and really want to know how the product worked for you. A product is only as good as its customers service. Great job
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: It definitely... Cleans you out. Messy though.. use on the toilet.
customer_reviews.text: I'd NEVER used one of these before. It actually helped flush everything out (I only use water). It can be messy though.. I would Not recommend doing this in the shower. Do it on the toilet and then prepare to be there for a little bit and to feel water squirt out of your butt! Weird feeling but nice and clean for play time.

customer_reviews.title: It works great.
customer_reviews.text: Being someone who never used on of these before I was afraid it wouldnt hold enough water or some other problem. I had no issues with it and it works great. The solid plastic tip is very easy to use and the bulb feels like quality material.

customer_reviews.title: The bulb is pretty good, with just one problem with the basic nozzle.
customer_reviews.text: The bulb is pretty good, with just one problem with the nozzle. The black nozzle that came packaged is far too hard for most uses so be extra careful when using it; however, they packaged a flexible curved clear nozzle that was absolutely amazing compared to the hard black one, overall the kit is absolutely worth the price, the only reason that this is a 4 star review instead of a 5 star one is because of the black nozzle.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Willems

customer_reviews.title: Recommend if it’s first enema
customer_reviews.text: Cleans you out ! It was my first enema and i was pretty skeptical at first like why would I shove something up my butt lol but it definitely keeps the flow of things ! I use this three times a week I also started keto recently so it helps keep things moving. Ppl say yo hold t for 10 to 12 min I couldn’t even do it for 1 the first time

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and hold a lot of water
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use and can hold a lot of water. I rub some lube to the area and insert the tip. It slides in easily like a butter. It does it's job to clean the area really well. It takes a little time to fill up/refill the tank though. But overall still a very good product.

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job at cleaning out your bum. Just remember to lube it up first, or else its gonna hurt.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Great to use before any anal play. Will leave you very clean. Use a little lube (lotion) on the rectal opening to ease insertion.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Lover

customer_reviews.title: Cleans the rectal area well.
customer_reviews.text: The bulb itself is great. Needed something to use quickly for a little 1 on 1 time with my man. Gets the job done prior to doing the deed. Easy to put together and the soft silicone plastic tip easy to use. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: April Inman

customer_reviews.title: Sex on the go?
customer_reviews.text: Yep, we like to play on vacation and this makes it easy to sort out the bum before we tumble. Done.
customer_reviews.author: SteampunkPhotos

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Happy for the most part with this product. Great way to improve hygiene. My only complaint with is product is the suction power and the nozzle. The suction could be better and the nozzle had some rough edges which made it a bit uncomfortable to the user. But overall I am more than satisfied with this product.

Even though I finally figured out a quick way to fill the bulb, it has no back flow prevention mechanism in it, and it’s difficult to clean. I even question its effectiveness over the good old reliable fleet enema kit. Gonna keep for emergency use tho...

You just have to make sure to squeeze all of the water into you at once or else you might come up with a mess cause you don't want it to suck the water back into it.

customer_reviews.title: It leaks
customer_reviews.text: Trying to save money and having a endless supply of enemas was my plan so I got this one. First, the black tip is very rigid and short. The clear one has a weird angle and I have not figure out how to use it, lastly it does leak I will stick to disposable ones.
customer_reviews.author: Maleny Luna

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use, easy to clean, effective, and convenient

I recommend applying a little silicone lube on the tip of the bulb before inserting. It works like a charm, especially if I have not had anything to eat 3 hours prior ;-)

customer_reviews.title: It’s a hit!

This one shoots more air at first then a 3/4 amount of water and the bulb or bottom portion doesn't hold as much water as I would have liked. But whatever, meh.

customer_reviews.text: Have it for a year or two and it has a crack at the top so it squirts water out the crack. Disappointing. the old ones I used to buy lasted at least 10 years.

customer_reviews.text: Quality product, very well made. It could use an instruction booklet or a tips sheet, however. The vendor is also very customer oriented. All in all, this is definitely a great product for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: iCLEVERi

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: Unlike many, I actually needed this for a medical condition, not butt play. However, if that's your thing this should work out well! Has 2 tips. One that isn't pliable and one that is. They go on easy and come off easily as well. It works fine. Made me poop. That was the plan!

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: The best part of waking up is Folgers in your ass.
customer_reviews.author: LinnyT

customer_reviews.title: You’ll achieve Clear water at some point
customer_reviews.text: This product is tricky, no real way to know if it’s full of water. It naturally feels heavy which translates to thinking its full to find out its full of air. No way to know how clean the inside is, just have to hope for the best. Not sure how I feel about it. I find the basic enema to work a bit better butt that’s my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Why

customer_reviews.title: LARGE size
customer_reviews.text: Durable and comfortable to use. This is a huge unit that really fills you up with water. Very effective and good quality. I recommend it and would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: harmful
customer_reviews.text: The tips on this unit can easily damage or puncture the small intestine. It is very difficult to fill and squeeze. I don't think it is really meant for what it is advertised for.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about purchasing one of these but, I finally got to use it. The only thing I disliked was how difficult it was to get the attachment into the bulb. Otherwise, it worked great, was very easy to use, and something I'll be using again.
customer_reviews.author: Billie

customer_reviews.title: Recieved a different nozzle attachment
customer_reviews.text: So far this product has been able to do the job, but I did not receive the straight black tip with the product. I instead recieved one with a curved, clear tip. I don't think it makes a huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia D

customer_reviews.title: Highly Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Everything works as intended. Nice product. Feels amazing, and it makes sex clean and great! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Nuckols

customer_reviews.title: This is a douche
customer_reviews.text: It functions but is on the small side. Roughly softball sized so understand that and how much water per use it can give. Don't expect a liter of cleanse.
customer_reviews.author: Dax H

customer_reviews.title: Did the job
customer_reviews.text: Did the job. Had never used one of these before but for the price it did what it’s supposed to do. Afterwards I just boiled all the components and seems good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: This was a bad idea for me personally. This product didn’t help me flush out, intact all it did was irritate my bottom and left me with inflammatory glands. Next time I’ll just go see someone to do this, haha.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: easy to grip
customer_reviews.text: Product was securely packaged and arrived as promised and in pristine condition. Bulb is made of a durable, easy to grip, rubber material. Preparation for use is practically fail-proof and can be accomplished in mere seconds. Filling the device can feel cumbersome and tedious at first but is quickly resolved after a few applications.
customer_reviews.author: David Long

customer_reviews.title: Convenient for travel!
customer_reviews.text: I used to use it in the shower but it is not convenient to carry. So I chose this product for travel. It works well and easy to use, very good!
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Lin

customer_reviews.title: Ur saving 💰
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it needs to do great product definitely saving money compared to my usual. (buying 2 boxes of douches for a total of $23.68)
customer_reviews.author: Nicholle Marie

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and effective...
customer_reviews.text: I found this enema bulb to work very well. It fills quickly with water, empties easily with no leakage and cleans up easily. I’m very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: T. F. WhiteTop Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: Hard To Say
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what to say on this product other than it would be a great product if it had a softer tip or a bulbed tip and a twisted bottom so the user can efficiently clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike N.

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: It works but hard to squeeze especially for an elderly person.
customer_reviews.author: etaylor

customer_reviews.title: works for us
customer_reviews.text: the key to not breaking the plastic nozzle is to insert and remove it straight up and down, its a tight fit as it should be. not sure what the difference is between this one for 10 bucks and the other one for 5 bucks
customer_reviews.author: not you

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about this one..
customer_reviews.text: Very small opening. You'd need to slow your faucet to a mere trickle to be able to fill the bulb (which can take several minutes). Even then, re-inserting the nozzle can force some of the water out leaving air pockets. Didn't really feel like it's one of the better products out there. I think screw on nozzles may work better than ones like these where you have to jam the nozzle back in due to less wear and tear (no pun intended).
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say, it works well and it's easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and does it well.
customer_reviews.text: Works like it should. The clear plastic applicators stain easily though.  ̄\_(ツ)_/ ̄ This gay gives it two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a device that does a perfect job as a anal douche and I have finally found it. This does the job in a very easy fashion and with no discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Chip63

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: This enema does its job well! No discomfort, easy to use and flushed me out very well. The most important point is that it‘s of good quality and can be recycled.
customer_reviews.author: Jacky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect and does what it is used for with ease Highly recommend it Oh, and it came with an extra nozzle which I didn’t know so that was a nice surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Renee Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Felt Weird
customer_reviews.text: I used it once and never again. I felt like air shot up there instead of water. It felt like a weird inward fart. I don't think it's safe. And the product has a lingering smell.
customer_reviews.author: Jamelia O

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I used this yesterday while camping. It was nice and convenient. It's very nicely built and easy to use. I would recommend the clear nozzle over the black one.
customer_reviews.author: ELawson

customer_reviews.title: First time using one...
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, we have a cleaner experience when I DON’T use this! Very hard to squeeze also! Wasn’t impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Oz

customer_reviews.title: The point si too sharp for me.  Take care.
customer_reviews.text: Take care as the point to too sharp. USe a great amount of care doing this.
customer_reviews.author: Testing one

Certificate approved: The douche enema kit is made of premium PVC with COA certificate and designed for anal douche enema. Perfect douche for men/women.

THE NOZZLE screws onto the bulb for no leakage. Bulb and nozzle can be safely cleaned with vinegar, soap and warm water using. And with 2 nozzles.
